prompt: What do you want to do?
description: This is to simulate user input
This is the main orchestration node that routes the player's input to the appropriate graph based on the intent or action requested

prompt: ##NOLLM Route input to the combat resolution graph
description: Triggered when player initiates combat or combat conditions are detected

prompt: ##NOLLM Route input to the social interaction graph
description: Triggered when a player is speaking with an NPC or engaging in social dialogue

prompt: ##NOLLM Route input to the environment exploration graph
description: Triggered when the player is exploring or searching the environment or examining objects
update logs and prepare post-session feedback
context: Triggered at the end of a session or when the GM initiates a session wrap-up

prompt: Provide help or re-prompt based on unrecognized player input
description: Fallback step if no other route matches the player input or intent is unclear
